original_text: After they left the room, they began saying to one another, “This man is not doing anything that deserves death or imprisonment.”
korean_text: 물러가 서로 말하되 이 사람은 사형이나 결박을 당할 만한 행위가 없다 하더라

sentences.original_text: they began saying to one another
This man is not doing anything
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람은 아무것도 하고 있지 않다
